informative.title: 1. Informative Attributes
informative.description: Base/family, available desktop environments, release date, package manager, release model (rolling/fixed), LTS support.

practical.title: 2. Practical Indicators
practical.description: Idle RAM usage, CPU and I/O benchmarks, minimum hardware requirements, documentation quality, community size.

consolidated.title: 3. Consolidated View (Score)
consolidated.description: Score from 0-10 based on performance, stability, ease of use, community support, and package updates. Weights adjusted for desktop use.

howWeScore.title: How we score
howWeScore.intro: The overall score is calculated considering multiple factors:
howWeScore.performance: Performance (30%): Idle RAM, CPU and I/O benchmarks

limitations.title: Limitations and Transparency
items: Benchmarks are run on standardized hardware, results may vary on your system.
Scope focused on desktop use. We don't cover servers or embedded systems.
Scores are updated periodically, but don't reflect real-time changes.
The "best distro" depends on your specific use case. Use our filters!
